entry.string: Overview
What is it?
The Roles module lets you manage users and groups on your site. Roles are representations of users and the different groups they can belong to.

Roles can be members of other roles, to any degree. You can, for instance, use roles to represent a company's organization chart, or the set of classes at a university. A role can be a member of as many other roles as you like (as long as the parents are groups).
entry.translation: En roll kan vara medlem i en annan roll, i valfri utsträckning. Roller kan tex representera ett företags organisationsschema, eller mängden kurser på ett universitet. En roll kan vara medlem i hur många andra roller som helst (så länge som föräldrarna är grupper)

entry.string: Roles can be assigned privileges. By doing so, you define what a given role may or may not do on the site. You can use the test functionality of the Roles module to see what parts of the site a role with a given set of privileges has access to.

Roles have inheritance. A role inherits all the privileges of all of its parents, but can override them. If you give a group editing privileges, for instance, any other role that is a member of that group inherits the editing privileges. If you want to restrict the privileges of some of the members, simply assign them a different set of privileges (say reading), and the privileges of the parent will be overridden.
How to use it?

The roles on your site are arranged in a tree. At the top of the tree is a role called Everybody, which represents the "group of all groups" on your site. Every user and every group is a member or descendent of Everybody.
Xaraya also comes preconfigured with a minimal set of roles that are loaded when you run the installer. This configuration is shown below:
entry.translation: Xaraya kommer även förkonfigurerad med en minimal mängd roller som laddas när du installerar systemet. Konfigurationen visas nedan:

entry.string: Everybody: the role containing all other roles. This role has no access privileges.
Anonymous: a user that represents any unregistered users on your site. This role is initially configured with privileges only to access the front page of the site and the login block.
entry.translation: Anonym (Anonymous): är en användare som representerar alla icke-registrerade användare på din sajt. Den här rollen konfigureras ursprungligen med behörighet att enbart komma åt framsidan och inloggnings-blocket.

entry.string: Administrators: a group that has administration privileges.
Admin: a member of Administrators. This is the Admin role you create with the Xaraya installer.
entry.translation: Admin: medlem av Administratörer. Det här är Admin-rollen som skapas vid installationen av Xaraya.

entry.string: Users: a group that normally holds registered users of the site. N.B.: this role does not come preconfigured with any privileges. Its members will not have access to the site until you assign some privileges.
The preconfigured roles cannot be changed or removed. You can, however, add members to them. You can also define as many more roles in the tree as you wish in whatever configuration you choose.
entry.translation: De förkonfigurerade rollerna kan inte ändras eller tas bort. Du kan däremot lägga till medlemmar. Du kan även definiera många fler roller i trädet som du önskar i vilken konfiguraton som helst som du väljer.

entry.string: Always keep in mind: When you create a role, until you've assigned it some privileges, it will only have those privileges it inherits from its parents.
entry.translation: Kom dock ihåg: När du skapar en roll kommer den bara att ha behörigheterna den ärver från sina föräldrar tills du tilldelar den egna behörighter.

entry.string: Included Blocks
Login Block allows users to login
Online Block shows the number visiting your site right now.
entry.translation: Uppkopplade-blocket visar hur många som besöker din webbsida just nu.

entry.string: Included Hooks
The roles module allows the use of the User Menu hook which will allow users to set values to further enhance their visit.
entry.translation: Modulen roller tillåter användandet av kopplingen "User Menu" som låter användare att sätta värden som berikar deras besök.

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found in
entry.translation: Utökad information om den här modulen kan hittas i

entry.string: RFC-30
